第 21 章 /etc

目录

21.1. /etc/inputrc
21.2. /etc/shells

21.1. /etc/inputrc

键盘映射配置文件,用户不同终端下的键盘定义

    	
% grep -v '^#' /etc/inputrc | grep -v "^$"
set input-meta on
set output-meta on
$if mode=emacs
"\e[1~": beginning-of-line
"\e[4~": end-of-line
"\e[3~": delete-char
"\e[2~": quoted-insert
"\e[1;5C": forward-word
"\e[1;5D": backward-word
"\e[5C": forward-word
"\e[5D": backward-word
"\e\e[C": forward-word
"\e\e[D": backward-word
$if term=rxvt
"\e[8~": end-of-line
"\eOc": forward-word
"\eOd": backward-word
$endif
$endif
